name: Afterlife
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Alabaster Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Its mortar is mixed with waters straight from the Fountain of Cho.

name: Armistice
oracle_text: {3}{W}{W}: You draw a card and target opponent gains 3 life.
flavor_text:
We all must profit for peace to last.
—Mercadian saying

name: Arrest
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: Orim had no memory of the previous night—the first thing she could remember was waking up with the dead guard's blood on her hands.

name: Ballista Squad
oracle_text: {X}{W}, {T}: Ballista Squad deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: The perfect antidote for a tightly packed formation.

name: Charm Peddler
oracle_text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Charmed Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
When Charmed Griffin enters the battlefield, each other player may put an artifact or enchantment card onto the battlefield from their hand.
flavor_text: Are you sure you can afford such a luxury?

name: Cho-Arrim Alchemist
oracle_text: {1}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

name: Cho-Arrim Bruiser
oracle_text: Whenever Cho-Arrim Bruiser attacks, you may tap up to two target creatures.
flavor_text: He doesn't know why the Cho-Arrim fight the Mercadians, but he's happy to bash heads for them anyway.

name: Cho-Arrim Legate
oracle_text: If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Plains, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
Protection from black

name: Cho-Manno, Revolutionary
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.
flavor_text:
"Mercadia's masks can no longer hide the truth. Our day has come at last."
—Cho-Manno

name: Cho-Manno's Blessing
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
As Cho-Manno's Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Cho-Manno's Blessing.

name: Common Cause
oracle_text: Nonartifact creatures get +2/+2 as long as they all share a color.
flavor_text: Mercadia City's troops are at their best when they have no enemy to fight.

name: Cornered Market
oracle_text: Players can't cast spells with the same name as a nontoken permanent.
Players can't play nonbasic lands with the same name as a nontoken permanent.
flavor_text:
Don't step on the livelihood of other vendors, or they may step on you.
—Mercadian saying

name: Crackdown
oracle_text: Nonwhite creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor_text:
"There is no place for mercy in defense of our lives."
—Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

name: Crossbow Infantry
oracle_text: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: The crossbow is the ideal weapon for the lazy Mercadians: just point and shoot.

name: Devout Witness
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim fought Mercadia's decadence with more than just swords.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
The scepter of power is fragile in a calloused hand.
—Cho-Arrim saying

name: Fountain Watch
oracle_text: Artifacts and enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim didn't rely only on a secret location to protect their Fountain.

name: Fresh Volunteers
flavor_text: Every Cho-Arrim villager is a potential warrior; when they are called, they abandon their peaceful way of life and take up arms to defend it.

name: Honor the Fallen
oracle_text: Exile all creature cards from all graveyards. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.
flavor_text:
"May the River claim Cho-Manno's body, wherever it lies."
—Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

name: Ignoble Soldier
oracle_text: Whenever Ignoble Soldier becomes blocked, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by it this turn.
flavor_text: Cowardice is a term invented by those with no cunning.

name: Inviolability
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature.
flavor_text: A soldier's faith is magic strong enough to protect against any blade.

name: Ivory Mask
oracle_text: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: "I did not choose my role, Orim," said Cho-Manno patiently, "and I suspect Gerrard did not choose his."

name: Jhovall Queen
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: War-trained jhovalls eat twice their weight in war-trained soldiers daily.

name: Jhovall Rider
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: Don't be fooled by the riders' fluid grace—it takes years of practice to ride these beasts.

name: Last Breath
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text: "The River flows. My soul returns."

name: Moment of Silence
oracle_text: Target player skips their next combat phase this turn.
flavor_text: The silence commemorates not those who've died, but those about to.

name: Moonlit Wake
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"As long as Rushwood glows, no life is ever truly lost."
—Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

name: Muzzle
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
Clenched teeth do not bite.
—Cho-Arrim saying

name: Nightwind Glider
oracle_text: Flying, protection from black
flavor_text: Once you learn to float on the shadows, you'll never fear them again.

name: Noble Purpose
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: Fighting for the right reason is itself a source of strength.

name: Orim's Cure
oracle_text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Pious Warrior
oracle_text: Whenever Pious Warrior is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim make no distinction between healers and soldiers.

name: Ramosian Captain
oracle_text: First strike
{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim believe in leading by example.

name: Ramosian Commander
oracle_text: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Cho-Manno guides your spirit. I guide your sword."

name: Ramosian Lieutenant
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Give me your hand and I will give you victory."

name: Ramosian Rally
oracle_text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Ramosian Sergeant
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Her commands are part rallying cry, part sermon, and wholly undeniable.

name: Ramosian Sky Marshal
oracle_text: Flying
{7}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim fell from the sky onto Mercadia City like a vengeful rain.

name: Rappelling Scouts
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{W}: Rappelling Scouts gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Renounce
oracle_text: Sacrifice any number of permanents. You gain 2 life for each permanent sacrificed this way.
flavor_text: Gerrard offered no defense to Orim's condemnation; the mission was under his command, and he was responsible.

name: Revered Elder
oracle_text: {1}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Revered Elder this turn.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim worship life and revere those who've experienced it longest.

name: Reverent Mantra
oracle_text: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Choose a color. All creatures gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

name: Righteous Aura
oracle_text: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor_text:
"There is a great difference between pain and injury."
—Cho-Manno

name: Righteous Indignation
oracle_text: Whenever a creature blocks a black or red creature, the blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You are the disease that plagues Mercadia. I am the healer's knife that will cut you out."

name: Security Detail
oracle_text: {W}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Activate this ability only if you control no creatures and only once each turn.

name: Soothing Balm
oracle_text: Target player gains 5 life.
flavor_text: Orim taught Ta-Karnst and the other Cho-Arrim healers a far less invasive method of healing.

name: Spiritual Focus
oracle_text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you gain 2 life and you may draw a card.

name: Steadfast Guard
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: The Mercadians were prepared for the guard, but the guard was even more prepared for the Mercadians.

name: Story Circle
oracle_text: As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Task Force
oracle_text: Whenever Task Force becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They are the reflection of Rushwood's glow on the edge of a wooden sword.

name: Thermal Glider
oracle_text: Flying, protection from red
flavor_text:
"The Mercadians are too busy looking down on us to see us coming."
—Cho-Arrim rebel

name: Tonic Peddler
oracle_text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player gains 3 life.
flavor_text: "The price is written at the bottom of the cup."

name: Trap Runner
oracle_text: {T}: Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. Activate this ability only during combat after blockers are declared. (This ability works on creatures that can't be blocked.)
flavor_text: "How could I catch her when the trees conspired to stop me?"

name: Wave of Reckoning
oracle_text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
flavor_text: Inner conflict can defeat a soldier more quickly than any army.

name: Wishmonger
oracle_text: {2}: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: "It's not what you ask for, but how you ask for it."

name: Aerial Caravan
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{U}{U}: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. (Reveal the card as you exile it.)
flavor_text: Successful delivery is *not* guaranteed.

name: Balloon Peddler
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The market festival turned out to be the high point of Jaffy's visit.

name: Blockade Runner
oracle_text: {U}: Blockade Runner can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "I need to get back to Mercadia City," said Sisay. "We can get you there," the vizier answered. "Easily."

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I see more than others do because I know where to look."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Bribery
oracle_text: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.
flavor_text: In Mercadia City, loyalties extend only as far as your purse can stretch.

name: Buoyancy
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: Saprazzan merfolk become legged on land, but some find it quicker to bring the water with them.

name: Chambered Nautilus
oracle_text: Whenever Chambered Nautilus becomes blocked, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: What's merely a home for the nautilus can become exquisite jewelry in the hands of Saprazzan artisans.

name: Chameleon Spirit
oracle_text: As Chameleon Spirit enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Chameleon Spirit's power and toughness are each equal to the number of permanents of the chosen color your opponents control.

name: Charisma
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, gain control of the other creature for as long as Charisma remains on the battlefield.
flavor_text: It was Gerrard's nature to lead and the Mercadians' to follow.

name: Cloud Sprite
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.

name: Coastal Piracy
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "I don't like to think of myself as a pirate. I'm more like a stimulator of the local economy."

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"Your attack has been rendered harmless. It is, however, quite pretty."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Cowardice
oracle_text: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)
flavor_text: Gerrard was the Mercadian soldiers' greatest hero; they followed him blindly. When he left, they stumbled around blindly.

name: Customs Depot
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: A bribe is always faster than filling out paperwork.

name: Darting Merfolk
oracle_text: {U}: Return Darting Merfolk to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: You might as well try to catch water with a net.

name: Dehydration
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text:
"You say Saprazzo is a city built on water? I hope they have enough to wash the dust from my throat."
—Sisay

name: Diplomatic Escort
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target spell or ability that targets a creature.

name: Diplomatic Immunity
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Shroud (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Enchanted creature has shroud.

name: Drake Hatchling
oracle_text: Flying
{U}: Drake Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: There is beauty in the space between learning to fly and taking it for granted.

name: Embargo
oracle_text: Nonland permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

name: Energy Flux
oracle_text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."
flavor_text: Karn said nothing—he just grasped the powerstone and squeezed tightly. The wild flashing ceased.

name: Extravagant Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Extravagant Spirit unless you pay {1} for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: The fewer your possessions, the fewer your worries.

name: False Demise
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: "Go down there and fish him out. Maybe his hide will fetch a price."

name: Glowing Anemone
oracle_text: When Glowing Anemone enters the battlefield, you may return target land to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Beautiful to behold, terrible to be held.

name: Gush
oracle_text: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

name: High Seas
oracle_text: Red creature spells and green creature spells cost {1} more to cast.
flavor_text:
Bend as the wave breaks or it will break you as well.
—Saprazzan saying

name: Hoodwink
oracle_text: Return target artifact, enchantment, or land to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The youths of Rishada's marketplace are always ready for a quick footrace.

name: Indentured Djinn
oracle_text: Flying
When Indentured Djinn enters the battlefield, each other player may draw up to three cards.
flavor_text: It's not always clear who's the master and who's the servant.

name: Karn's Touch
oracle_text: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn. (It retains its abilities.)

name: Misdirection
oracle_text: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Change the target of target spell with a single target.

name: Misstep
oracle_text: Creatures target player controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.
flavor_text:
The feet have no eyes.
—Saprazzan saying

name: Overtaker
oracle_text: {3}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It's no challenge to master a Mercadian."

name: Port Inspector
oracle_text: Whenever Port Inspector becomes blocked, you may look at defending player's hand.
flavor_text: "There may be a few minor additional fees, levies, duties, surtaxes, tariffs, imposts, tolls . . . ."

name: Rishadan Airship
oracle_text: Flying
Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The view is truly spectacular—as long as you don't look at Rishada itself.

name: Rishadan Brigand
oracle_text: Flying
When Rishadan Brigand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {3}.
Rishadan Brigand can block only creatures with flying.

name: Rishadan Cutpurse
oracle_text: When Rishadan Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.
flavor_text:
The bigger the purse, the greater the fool.
—Rishadan saying

name: Rishadan Footpad
oracle_text: When Rishadan Footpad enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {2}.
flavor_text: "The best things in life are free. Money, for instance."

name: Sailmonger
oracle_text: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: Clients who cheat the sailmonger make an impact on the rest.

name: Sand Squid
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
You may choose not to untap Sand Squid during your untap step.
{T}: Tap target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Sand Squid remains tapped.

name: Saprazzan Bailiff
oracle_text: When Saprazzan Bailiff enters the battlefield, exile all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards.
When Saprazzan Bailiff leaves the battlefield, return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

name: Saprazzan Breaker
oracle_text: {U}: Put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, Saprazzan Breaker can't be blocked this turn.

name: Saprazzan Heir
oracle_text: Whenever Saprazzan Heir becomes blocked, you may draw three cards.
flavor_text: Within the walls of the floating city, Saprazzan wealth is like Saprazzan water: abundant, free-flowing, and accessible to all.

name: Saprazzan Legate
oracle_text: If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control an Island, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
Flying

name: Saprazzan Outrigger
oracle_text: When Saprazzan Outrigger attacks or blocks, put it on top of its owner's library at end of combat.
flavor_text: The Saprazzans excel at both tactics: hit *and* run.

name: Saprazzan Raider
oracle_text: When Saprazzan Raider becomes blocked, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Some quick dagger work and then back to the sea—that's the Saprazzan way.

name: Shoving Match
oracle_text: Until end of turn, all creatures gain "{T}: Tap target creature."
flavor_text: Rishadan barkeeps know something the Mercadians have yet to learn: if you keep pushing, someone will eventually push back.

name: Soothsaying
oracle_text: {3}{U}{U}: Shuffle your library.
{X}: Look at the top X cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: The vizier's wisdom proved invaluable in untangling the Mercadian knot of lies.

name: Squeeze
oracle_text: Sorcery spells cost {3} more to cast.
flavor_text: Any pirate would prefer Rishada's swift and cruel justice to Saprazzo's patient punishments.

name: Statecraft
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"Inside these walls, peace; outside, sharks. You choose."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Stinging Barrier
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}, {T}: Stinging Barrier deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Thwart
oracle_text: You may return three Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

name: Tidal Bore
oracle_text: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text: The dry riverbed became a raging torrent, and the Cho-Arrim claimed their prize.

name: Tidal Kraken
oracle_text: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.
flavor_text: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.

name: Timid Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When another creature enters the battlefield, return Timid Drake to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It flees from anything that isn't shaped like a cloud.

name: Trade Routes
oracle_text: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.
{1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Like the price of goods, the value of the routes was renegotiated daily.

name: War Tax
oracle_text: {X}{U}: This turn, creatures can't attack unless their controller pays {X} for each attacking creature they control.
flavor_text: The worst thing about being a depraved pirate is having to work with a bunch of depraved pirates.

name: Waterfront Bouncer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Closing time comes earlier to some than to others.

name: Alley Grifters
oracle_text: Whenever Alley Grifters becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.
flavor_text: One distracts the victim, the other extracts the valuables.

name: Black Market
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Black Market.

name: Bog Smugglers
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: They slide over the bog like oil across glass.

name: Bog Witch
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.

name: Cackling Witch
oracle_text: {X}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The touch of his madness can drive anyone into a killing frenzy.

name: Cateran Brute
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The Cateran guild prefers to call them "public relations."

name: Cateran Enforcer
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Cateran Kidnappers
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Recruits aren't always volunteers.

name: Cateran Overlord
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Cateran Overlord.
{6}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Cateran Persuader
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 1 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Cateran Slaver
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Cateran Summons
oracle_text: Search your library for a Mercenary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Even when recruitment is slow, the guild can always cook something up.

name: Conspiracy
oracle_text: As Conspiracy enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

name: Corrupt Official
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Regenerate Corrupt Official.
Whenever Corrupt Official becomes blocked, defending player discards a card at random.
flavor_text: His favor comes at a high price.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"Eye of twilight, give us sight.
Take our offer, give us might.
Make our power tears of night."

name: Deathgazer
oracle_text: Whenever Deathgazer blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Deepwood Ghoul
oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Regenerate Deepwood Ghoul.
flavor_text: They feed on the living to stay undead.

name: Deepwood Legate
oracle_text: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control a Swamp, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
{B}: Deepwood Legate gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Delraich
oracle_text: You may sacrifice three black creatures rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Trample
flavor_text: It wears the souls of its victims like jewels on a chain.

name: Enslaved Horror
oracle_text: When Enslaved Horror enters the battlefield, each other player may return a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Extortion
oracle_text: Look at target player's hand and choose up to two cards from it. That player discards those cards.
flavor_text: The enforcers make no effort to distinguish gold from flesh.

name: Forced March
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost X or less.
flavor_text: The Caterans call it a screening process. The dead are in no condition to argue.

name: Ghoul's Feast
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Mercadians not wealthy enough to buy a tomb are thrown into a bog called "the Ghoul's Larder."

name: Haunted Crossroads
oracle_text: {B}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text: It seemed as if no one wanted them to reach the Henge of Ramos—not even the dead.

name: Highway Robber
oracle_text: When Highway Robber enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Tonight, madam, it's your money *and* your life."

name: Instigator
oracle_text: {1}{B}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures target player controls attack this turn if able.
flavor_text: The desecration of their dead makes even the Saprazzans careless.

name: Insubordination
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, Insubordination deals 2 damage to that player unless that creature attacked this turn.

name: Intimidation
oracle_text: Creatures you control have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: "If they move, kill them. In fact, kill one now to make sure the other understands."

name: Larceny
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Liability
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into a player's graveyard from the battlefield, that player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Gerrard realized that the helpless woman they'd rescued from Rath was nothing of the sort.

name: Maggot Therapy
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.
flavor_text:
"If this is the cure, I'd hate to see the disease."
—Orim

name: Midnight Ritual
oracle_text: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Bury old friends deeply, lest they return bearing worms.

name: Misshapen Fiend
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: You'd scarcely believe they could fly until they drop out of the sky onto you.

name: Molting Harpy
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Molting Harpy unless you pay {2}.
flavor_text: Shed harpy feathers leave painful wounds—which explains the harpies' mood.

name: Nether Spirit
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Spirit is the only creature card in your graveyard, you may return Nether Spirit to the battlefield.
flavor_text: It roams in both the worlds of the living and the dead but belongs to neither.

name: Notorious Assassin
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: He wears his infamy like a fine silk shirt.

name: Pretender's Claim
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, tap all lands defending player controls.
flavor_text: The surest way to lose your holdings is to plead for them in Mercadia City's courts.

name: Primeval Shambler
oracle_text: {B}: Primeval Shambler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His mind, like his body, is made up of the swamp's flotsam.

name: Putrefaction
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a green or white spell, that player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Do you want to be alive or whole?"
—Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

name: Quagmire Lamprey
oracle_text: Whenever Quagmire Lamprey becomes blocked by a creature, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

name: Rain of Tears
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: Mercadian elitism is reinforced daily by physical position: their neighbors are literally beneath them and are treated accordingly.

name: Rampart Crawler
oracle_text: Rampart Crawler can't be blocked by Walls.
flavor_text:
"Not even the magistrate in his lofty tower is out of our reach."
—Cateran overlord

name: Rouse
oracle_text: If you control a Swamp, you may pay 2 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Scandalmonger
oracle_text: {2}: Target player discards a card. Any player may activate this ability but only any time they could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: Silence costs extra. Breaking it costs extra still.

name: Sever Soul
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"With the proper tools, even the Great River can be dammed."
—Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

name: Silent Assassin
oracle_text: {3}{B}: Destroy target blocking creature at end of combat.
flavor_text: She feels no need to disturb her victim's slumber.

name: Skulking Fugitive
oracle_text: When Skulking Fugitive becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text: In the Cateran guild, being caught is a capital offense.

name: Snuff Out
oracle_text: If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Squee watched his Kyren cousins fall with a mixture of sympathy and relief.

name: Soul Channeling
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Pay 2 life: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Driven by masters more terrible than the Mercadians could imagine, the dark overseers would pay any price to keep their shipwrights working.

name: Specter's Wail
oracle_text: Target player discards a card at random.
flavor_text: As he gritted his teeth to focus through the pain, Tahngarth glanced at Takara. She seemed completely unaffected.

name: Strongarm Thug
oracle_text: When Strongarm Thug enters the battlefield, you may return target Mercenary card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "No, I insist—let *me* carry all that heavy jewelry."

name: Thrashing Wumpus
oracle_text: {B}: Thrashing Wumpus deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: Young wumpuses are malevolent and vicious—but they grow out of it.

name: Undertaker
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.

name: Unmask
oracle_text: You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

name: Unnatural Hunger
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Unnatural Hunger deals damage equal to that creature's power to that player unless they sacrifice another creature.

name: Vendetta
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text: Starke knew the voice was Takara's, but the venom was Volrath's.

name: Wall of Distortion
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: It reflects only nightmares.

name: Arms Dealer
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: He has the weapons, he has the connections, and he knows the hangar's dark secret.

name: Battle Rampart
oracle_text: Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Battle Squadron
oracle_text: Flying
Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.

name: Blaster Mage
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target Wall.
flavor_text: "Don't get up. I'll show myself out."

name: Blood Hound
oracle_text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Blood Hound.
At the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Blood Hound.

name: Blood Oath
oracle_text: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals their hand. Blood Oath deals 3 damage to that player for each card of the chosen type revealed this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

name: Brawl
oracle_text: Until end of turn, all creatures gain "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature."
flavor_text: Anything can happen when patience is scarce and wine is abundant.

name: Cave Sense
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

name: Cave-In
oracle_text: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Cave-In deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: One fleet was gone; others were poised.

name: Cavern Crawler
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
{R}: Cavern Crawler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Ceremonial Guard
oracle_text: When Ceremonial Guard attacks or blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"These guards are the most disciplined military unit in the city. They couldn't fight their way out of a broom closet, but they've got discipline."
—Gerrard, to Sisay

name: Cinder Elemental
oracle_text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.

name: Close Quarters
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, Close Quarters deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The Mercadians' ineptitude in close combat sometimes accidentally pays off.

name: Crag Saurian
oracle_text: Whenever a source deals damage to Crag Saurian, that source's controller gains control of Crag Saurian.
flavor_text: It follows the strongest leader—the one with the longest whip.

name: Crash
oracle_text: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Gerrard shook his head as the ground rushed to meet him. "This," he thought, "is not the start I was hoping for."

name: Flailing Manticore
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
{1}: Flailing Manticore gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
{1}: Flailing Manticore gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Flailing Ogre
oracle_text: {1}: Flailing Ogre gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
{1}: Flailing Ogre gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Flailing Soldier
oracle_text: {1}: Flailing Soldier gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
{1}: Flailing Soldier gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Flaming Sword
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
flavor_text:
"It's not Talruum crystal, but I must admit—it gets the job done."
—Tahngarth

name: Furious Assault
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, Furious Assault deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Does it burn, Saprazzan? Do you wish you had never raised arms against us?"
—Kyren overseer

name: Gerrard's Irregulars
oracle_text: Trample, haste
flavor_text: Had Gerrard realized he'd end up fighting against them, he might not have trained them so well.

name: Hammer Mage
oracle_text: {X}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy all artifacts with converted mana cost X or less.
flavor_text: When he's holding the hammers, everything looks like a nail.

name: Hired Giant
oracle_text: When Hired Giant enters the battlefield, each other player may search their library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

name: Kris Mage
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Kris Mage deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Her blade draws blood without ever touching its target.

name: Kyren Glider
oracle_text: Flying
Kyren Glider can't block.
flavor_text: Mercadia's Kyren goblins are the opposite of Dominarian goblins: they're smart and cowardly.

name: Kyren Legate
oracle_text: If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Mountain, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
Haste

name: Kyren Negotiations
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Kyren Negotiations deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Kyren goblins always speak in questions and never allow wrong answers.

name: Kyren Sniper
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Kyren Sniper deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Kyren goblins always act behind the scenes—even in battle.

name: Lava Runner
oracle_text: Haste
Whenever Lava Runner becomes the target of a spell or ability, that spell or ability's controller sacrifices a land.

name: Lightning Hounds
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: Quick enough to avoid jhovalls when alone and fierce enough to attack them in packs, the hounds were as at home in the mountains as the Mercadians were atop theirs.

name: Lithophage
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.
flavor_text: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

name: Lunge
oracle_text: Lunge deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Cho-Arrim righteousness was no match for Benalish combat training.

name: Magistrate's Veto
oracle_text: White creatures and blue creatures can't block.
flavor_text: The magistrate had been the goblins' puppet for so long that he made the right decisions with little prompting.

name: Mercadia's Downfall
oracle_text: Each attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each nonbasic land defending player controls.
flavor_text: With an explosion that shook the foundation of the city, the Weatherlight burst from the underground hangar.

name: Ogre Taskmaster
oracle_text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
flavor_text: He doesn't have to be smart—his masters only ever give him one command.

name: Pulverize
oracle_text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all artifacts.

name: Puppet's Verdict
oracle_text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. If you lose the flip, destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor_text:
"What was heads again?"
—Mercadian magistrate

name: Robber Fly
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Robber Fly becomes blocked, defending player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.
flavor_text: In pursuit of the juicy fly, Squee stumbled on the hidden hangar.

name: Rock Badger
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: The Kyren goblins created most of the inverted mountain's tunnels simply by driving the beast before them.

name: Seismic Mage
oracle_text: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: The ground shakes when he walks. His customers shake if they're late with his fee.

name: Shock Troops
oracle_text: Sacrifice Shock Troops: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: When goblins blow themselves up, it's called stupidity. When humans do, it's called heroism.

name: Sizzle
oracle_text: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Explosions ripped through the ship overhead, and those unfortunate enough to be directly below scrambled to find cover.

name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "General?!" Tahngarth roared. "General *nuisance*, maybe."

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: The return of Ramos was foretold by devastating natural disasters and unnatural storms.

name: Tectonic Break
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices X lands.
flavor_text: Only the foolish and the rich build their houses where the land is thin and the ocean is near.

name: Territorial Dispute
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Territorial Dispute unless you sacrifice a land.
Players can't play lands.
flavor_text: Bit by bit, Mercadia City had forced the Cho-Arrim from their ancestral lands. They would be pushed no further.

name: Thieves' Auction
oracle_text: Exile all nontoken permanents. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the exiled cards and puts it onto the battlefield tapped under their control. Repeat this process until all cards exiled this way have been chosen.

name: Thunderclap
oracle_text: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Thunderclap deals 3 damage to target creature.

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: Without a word, Gerrard and Sisay ran deeper into the mountain. Neither of them intended to leave Mercadia without the Weatherlight and its crew.

name: Two-Headed Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat.
{1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Uphill Battle
oracle_text: Creatures played by your opponents enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Cho-Manno knew he had no choice but to ally with Gerrard. If that's what it took to free his people, he'd pay the price.

name: Volcanic Wind
oracle_text: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield as you cast this spell.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim call it "the fury of Ramos."

name: War Cadence
oracle_text: {X}{R}: This turn, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {X} for each blocking creature they control.
flavor_text: The rhythm isn't a call to arms, but a signal that the goblins have made a new enemy.

name: Warmonger
oracle_text: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: Funny how money and war travel so well together.

name: Warpath
oracle_text: Warpath deals 3 damage to each blocking creature and each blocked creature.
flavor_text: Cho-Manno had never seen Mercadia City's forces fight so well. The magistrate must have hired a new hero.

name: Wild Jhovall
flavor_text: Jhovalls sharpen their claws on trees—or on Mercadians, if no trees are handy.

name: Word of Blasting
oracle_text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

name: Ancestral Mask
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.
flavor_text: The masks, like the ancient trees they're grown from, lend strength to the dryads.

name: Bifurcate
oracle_text: Search your library for a permanent card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Boa Constrictor
oracle_text: {T}: Boa Constrictor gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its eyes are bigger than its stomach, but its mouth is larger still.

name: Briar Patch
oracle_text: Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: As easily as the dryads could close a fist, so could the branches and underbrush entangle.

name: Caller of the Hunt
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, choose a creature type.
Caller of the Hunt's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures of the chosen type on the battlefield.

name: Caustic Wasps
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Caustic Wasps deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.
flavor_text: Even the wasp knows how to pay the magistrate his due respect.

name: Clear the Land
oracle_text: Each player reveals the top five cards of their library, puts all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield tapped, and exiles the rest.

name: Collective Unconscious
oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control.
flavor_text: Gerrard knew little of Ramos, the sky god they worshiped. But he felt the power of the chant.

name: Dawnstrider
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: Morning's mists can hide many things.

name: Deadly Insect
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: With his newfound sense of self-importance, Squee set his sights on ever-bigger bugs.

name: Deepwood Drummer
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His drums echo Deepwood's heartbeat.

name: Deepwood Elder
oracle_text: {X}{G}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: X target lands become Forests until end of turn.
flavor_text: They'd guarded the Henge so long that they were as attuned to the powerstones as they were to the trees.

name: Deepwood Tantiv
oracle_text: Whenever Deepwood Tantiv becomes blocked, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: A single tantiv is just as dangerous as a herd.

name: Deepwood Wolverine
oracle_text: Whenever Deepwood Wolverine becomes blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The jhovalls are depleting its food sources, the Mercadians are eroding its home, and you're wondering why it's angry?

name: Desert Twister
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent.
flavor_text: The magical dust clouds Mercadian mages use to traverse the plane generate storms that devastate the surrounding terrain. But as long as the storms don't touch the mountain, the nobles simply don't care.

name: Erithizon
oracle_text: Whenever Erithizon attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature of defending player's choice.
flavor_text: Unlike scorpions, the erithizon isn't immune to its own weaponry.

name: Ferocity
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"You lot go on ahead. I'll keep killing them until it sticks."
—Tahngarth

name: Food Chain
oracle_text: Exile a creature you control: Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the exiled creature's converted mana cost. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

name: Foster
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

name: Game Preserve
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library. If all cards revealed this way are creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield under their owners' control.

name: Giant Caterpillar
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Groundskeeper
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Whereas the rebels fight to defend the land, they work to renew it.

name: Horned Troll
oracle_text: {G}: Regenerate Horned Troll.
flavor_text:
"If I says it's a troll, it's a troll. Goblins is always right in Mercadia."
—Squee

name: Howling Wolf
oracle_text: When Howling Wolf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Howling Wolf, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Hunted Wumpus
oracle_text: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

name: Invigorate
oracle_text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life.
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Land Grant
oracle_text: If you have no land cards in hand, you may reveal your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Ley Line
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature of their choice.
flavor_text:
"I can feel the strength of the entire forest."
—Gerrard

name: Lumbering Satyr
oracle_text: All creatures have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text:
The satyr carves the path that all of Rushwood follows.
—Cho-Arrim saying

name: Lure
oracle_text: Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
flavor_text: Deepwood's reach is not long, so it invites its enemies in.

name: Megatherium
oracle_text: Trample
When Megatherium enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1} for each card in your hand.

name: Natural Affinity
oracle_text: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
flavor_text: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.

name: Pangosaur
oracle_text: Whenever a player plays a land, return Pangosaur to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Only Rushwood is vast enough to swallow this creature whole.

name: Revive
oracle_text: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Gerrard's heart ached, recalling the living wreath Mirri laid for her dead kin. No such memorial was left for her in Rath.

name: Rushwood Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Rushwood is a living jewel that reflects its dwellers' hearts.

name: Rushwood Elemental
oracle_text: Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rushwood Elemental.

name: Rushwood Herbalist
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: When generals gather their armies, healers gather their herbs.

name: Rushwood Legate
oracle_text: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Forest, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.

name: Saber Ants
oracle_text: Whenever Saber Ants is dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
flavor_text: They stay on the battlefield only long enough to consume the losers.

name: Sacred Prey
oracle_text: Whenever Sacred Prey becomes blocked, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: To see one is a good omen to the Cho-Arrim.

name: Silverglade Elemental
oracle_text: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Silverglade Pathfinder
oracle_text: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

name: Snake Pit
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a blue or black spell, you may create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.
flavor_text:
If the ground is smooth, the way will be rough.
—Deepwood saying

name: Snorting Gahr
oracle_text: Whenever Snorting Gahr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There's little advantage to surprising the gahr.

name: Spidersilk Armor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

name: Spontaneous Generation
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: Saprolings always thrive on the ruins of others, and Mercadia ruins more than most.

name: Squall
oracle_text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text: The air that holds them aloft can just as easily put them down.

name: Squallmonger
oracle_text: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: "Squall, gale, hurricane—it's all a matter of size . . . and price."

name: Stamina
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance.
Sacrifice Stamina: Regenerate enchanted creature.

name: Sustenance
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Like the dryads, the forest itself willingly gives up some of its life for the sake of the future.

name: Tiger Claws
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
flavor_text: Cho-Arrim martial artists emulate the beasts of their home.

name: Tranquility
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.
flavor_text: Sisay had been restored to her place on the ship, the Legacy had been recovered, and the Weatherlight was sailing home to Dominaria. Gerrard focused on the debts he'd settled . . . and on those he'd soon collect.

name: Venomous Breath
oracle_text: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.
flavor_text: The dryads need neither size nor strength to defeat their enemies in battle.

name: Venomous Dragonfly
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Venomous Dragonfly blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor_text: A pretty little death is still death.

name: Vernal Equinox
oracle_text: Any player may cast creature and enchantment spells as though they had flash.

name: Vine Dryad
oracle_text: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flash
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Vine Trellis
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "We protect our own with our own."

name: Assembly Hall
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Reveal a creature card in your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Barbed Wire
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Barbed Wire deals 1 damage to that player.
{2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt by Barbed Wire this turn.
flavor_text: A steel snake with ten thousand teeth.

name: Bargaining Table
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Draw a card. X is the number of cards in an opponent's hand.
flavor_text: Although it looks like a game, business around the table is deadly serious.

name: Credit Voucher
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Credit Voucher: Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

name: Crenellated Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Mercadian soldiers excel at finding things to stand behind.

name: Crooked Scales
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If you lose the flip, destroy target creature you control unless you pay {3} and repeat this process.

name: Crumbling Sanctuary
oracle_text: If damage would be dealt to a player, that player exiles that many cards from the top of their library instead.

name: Distorting Lens
oracle_text: {T}: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: The magistrate seems to prefer a distorted perspective of reality.

name: Eye of Ramos
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}.
Sacrifice Eye of Ramos: Add {U}.
flavor_text: Ramos wept, and there were seas.

name: General's Regalia
oracle_text: {3}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor_text: A uniform fit for a goblin.

name: Heart of Ramos
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.
Sacrifice Heart of Ramos: Add {R}.
flavor_text: Ramos bled, and there was fire.

name: Henge Guardian
oracle_text: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Like so many Thran relics, the wurm engine kept operating long after its creators were gone.

name: Horn of Plenty
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, they may pay {1}. If the player does, they draw a card at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"This horn is an exact replica of the fabled Horn of Ramos, except mine is more lavish."
—Mercadian magistrate

name: Horn of Ramos
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
Sacrifice Horn of Ramos: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Ramos touched, and there was life.

name: Iron Lance
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The only way to get Mercadians to fight on the front lines is to give them really long weapons."
—Gerrard

name: Jeweled Torque
oracle_text: As Jeweled Torque enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, you may pay {2}. If you do, you gain 2 life.

name: Kyren Archive
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile the top card of your library face down.
{5}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Kyren Archive: Put all cards exiled with Kyren Archive into their owner's hand.

name: Kyren Toy
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Kyren Toy.
{T}, Remove X charge counters from Kyren Toy: Add an amount of {C} equal to X plus one.

name: Magistrate's Scepter
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Magistrate's Scepter: Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Mercadian Atlas
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't play a land this turn, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: One may as well chart the clouds as try to map Mercadia.

name: Mercadian Lift
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Put a winch counter on Mercadian Lift.
{T}, Remove X winch counters from Mercadian Lift: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Monkey Cage
oracle_text: When a creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Monkey Cage and create X 2/2 green Monkey creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

name: Panacea
oracle_text: {X}{X}, {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: A drop numbs the tongue. A sip sends the heart racing. A draught reforges the body.

name: Power Matrix
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying, first strike, and trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: As he repaired the ship's planeswalking engine, Karn saw for the first time how he could catalyze the Weatherlight's evolution.

name: Puffer Extract
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: The puffer's flesh is the deadliest in the sea—and therefore the most useful.

name: Rishadan Pawnshop
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Shuffle target nontoken permanent you control into its owner's library.
flavor_text: Everything comes to the waterfront eventually, on the tide or on credit.

name: Skull of Ramos
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
Sacrifice Skull of Ramos: Add {B}.
flavor_text: Ramos fell, and there was night.

name: Tooth of Ramos
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
Sacrifice Tooth of Ramos: Add {W}.
flavor_text: Ramos smiled, and there was day.
